text:
Beyond Trust is a leader
in privileged access management solutions.

We differentiate against our competitors
by securing the path to privilege,

by protecting lateral movement
and privileged identities and accounts
throughout an organization.

The partnership between Beyond Trust
and AWS began with the hosting of our

new Identity Security Insight solutions
in the AWS cloud within North America.

The demand for the solution
was quite high, and we realized

we wanted to expand the offering
to other geolocations.
For Beyond Trust to stand up a new solution

in a brand new geolocation 
does take a few months.
By using the AWS Passport program,

we're able to expedite
those compliance requirements

and provide proof and information
on the trust center for clients in region
to assure them that the solution

is operating within all legal framework
and compliance requirements.

Essentially, we had to make sure the solution
was compliant in any region of the world.

AWS security experts helped us
review our installation and our code base,

and make distinct recommendations
on how to improve the solution
for compliance worldwide.

This included the professional services
and the security experts needed to help

our development teams modify
our solution, increase its security,
and overall provide compliance worldwide.

We were able to eliminate
the high costs of compliance

by putting it directly in code
and ensure our return on investment

when deploying to a new
geolocation was optimized.
